title: Deploy current app draft (Version 33) live

requirements.text: Deploy the current codebase (Version 33) to production on the Internet Computer, upgrading both the backend canister and the frontend asset canister using the existing single-actor backend architecture.

quotes: ok lets take this version live now

acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is completed using the current Version 33 sources.
Backend canister is upgraded successfully without breaking existing stable data.
Frontend loads successfully in production and routes render (/, and all /offers/* pages).

requirements.text: Run a production smoke test after deployment covering: landing page render, offer-page navigation, contact form submission path (including reCAPTCHA readiness handling), and admin-only backend queries remaining protected by access control.

quotes: ok lets take this version live now

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders without console errors.
Each offer route loads and the lazy-loading fallback shows appropriately during load.
Contact form can be submitted end-to-end (or shows the existing configured error state if reCAPTCHA is not configured), and the UI reaches the success state on a valid submission.
Unauthenticated callers cannot access admin-only query methods (e.g., getAllContactSubmissions, getAllContactSubmissionsJunk).

requirements.text: Verify production configuration needed for the deployed version is in place (e.g., reCAPTCHA settings expected by the frontend and backend), and document any required post-deploy admin steps (such as setting the reCAPTCHA secret via the existing admin method) to make the live contact form fully operational.

quotes: ok lets take this version live now

acceptanceCriteria: A short deployment note exists stating whether reCAPTCHA is configured in production and, if not, the exact admin action required to configure it using the existing backend method.
No user-facing placeholders or broken configuration states are introduced by the deployment.

constraints: Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new product features or changing UI/UX beyond what is necessary to deploy Version 33.
Implementing third-party auth beyond Internet Identity.
Adding external databases, non-Motoko backend services, or real-time/WebSocket functionality.
